description: TEHRAN – Iran’s support for Resistance groups in the region will continue unabated regardless of the ideological currents within the country’s leadership, said Hezbollah’s Secretary-General Sayyad Hassan Nasrallah during a speech on Wednesday.
title: Iran’s support for Resistance will continue to grow under any leadership: Hezbollah chief

description: TEHRAN- The Commander-in-Chief of the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps announced that IRGC will not hesitate to enter war in support of Muslims if needed.
title: Iran will not hesitate to engage in fight for other Muslims: Senior commander

description: TEHRAN - In a note, Kayhan addressed the goals of the Americans about negotiations with Iran and wrote: The main problem is that America does not see the issue of interaction with Iran in the sense of peaceful resolution of points of difference, rather, it uses negotiation and agreement as a tool to disarm and empty Iran's power sources.
title: American goals for negotiations with Iran

description: TEHRAN - A member of the presiding board of the Parliament announced that the inauguration ceremony of the elected president of Iran will be held on Tuesday, July 30.
title: Pezeshkian to be inaugurated on July 30

description: TEHRAN – Iran has spearheaded a joint statement on behalf of multiple nations, calling for the recognition of Zionism as a form of racism, citing systematic human rights violations against Palestinians by the Israeli regime.
title: Iran leads call for recognition of Zionism as racism at UN

description: TEHRAN- With the U.S. public debate replete with pro-Palestine sentiments, the American government seems to have found a new way to quash dissenting views: Linking protests to foreign governments.
title: Demonization of campus protestors

description: TEHRAN- The speaker of the Parliament left Teran for St. Petersburg, Russia, to attend the BRICS general assembly as the head of the Iranian parliamentary delegation.
title: Ghalibaf visits Russia for BRICS meeting

description: TEHRAN – Pakistan's Ambassador to Iran, Muhammad Mudassir Tipu, visited the Tehran Times headquarters on Wednesday to explore potential collaborations. He met with the publication's CEO and Editor-in-Chief and participated in an interview with a Tehran Times correspondent.
title: Cooperation will continue to grow under President-elect Pezeshkian

description: TEHRAN – Iranian President-elect Masoud Pezeshkian held a series of phone conversations on Tuesday with leaders of key regional players, including Syrian President Bashar al-Assad, Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan, and Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev.
title: Syria welcomes Iran's new president, emphasizes strong ties amidst regional challenges

description: TEHRAN – Senior border officials from member states of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) met in Shanghai, China on Wednesday to discuss further cooperation on border issues.
title: SCO member states strengthen border cooperation in Shanghai

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC) forces have successfully neutralized an armed terrorist team attempting to infiltrate Iran from its northwestern border.
title: IRGC thwarts terrorist infiltration in northwestern Iran

description: TEHRAN – Major General Abdolrahim Mousavi, the commander of the Iranian Army, has praised the country's young experts for significant military advancements, declaring the Navy's self-sufficiency in global navigation.
title: Iranian Army chief celebrates naval self-sufficiency milestone

description: TEHRAN- A Persian translation of British children's literature author Hannah Gold’s “The Last Bear” has recently been published by Milkan Publications in Tehran.
title: “The Last Bear” appears at Iranian bookstores

description: TEHRAN-The Iranian short film “The Last Temptation” written and directed by Ali Saadatmand will be shown in the On-Demand section of the 28th LA Shorts International Film Festival, to be held in Los Angeles, California, from July 17 to 28.
title: “The Last Temptation” to represent Iran at LA Shorts International Film Festival

description: TEHRAN-Divar Art Home in Tehran will host the play “Veronica's Room” written by Ira Levin from July 15.
title: Ira Levin’s “Veronica's Room” to be staged in Tehran

description: TEHRAN- The 43rd edition of Fajr International Film Festival has announced a call for entries, aiming to identify and promote valuable cinematic works from Iran and around the world.
title: Fajr Intl. Film Festival invites global filmmakers to submit works

description: The spokesman for the Yemeni Armed Forces said the country’s naval forces and missile units carried out three operations against vessels linked to the US and Israel off the nation's coast, in solidarity with Palestinians amid the ongoing Israeli onslaught on Gaza.
title: Yemen strikes vessels linked to U.S., Israel

description: An investigation by Israeli human rights group Yesh Din has found that of 573 cases of wrongdoing by the Israeli military in Gaza over the past decade, only one case led to a prosecution.
title: Israel ignores war crimes against Palestinians

description: Spain's left-wing opposition Podemos party accused the government of hypocrisy regarding arms sales to Israel.
title: Spain's opposition accuses government of 'hypocrisy' over arms sales to Israel

description: At the graduation ceremony of New York University Abu Dhabi this May, a student wearing the traditional Palestinian black-and-white keffiyeh scarf shouted “Free Palestine!” as he crossed the stage to receive his diploma, witnesses have told The Associated Press. Days later, he reportedly was deported from the United Arab Emirates.
title: AP: UAE deported student who shouted ‘Free Palestine’ at NYU Abu Dhabi graduation

description: The first Democratic senator has publicly questioned President Joe Biden's election chances, after seven Congress members broke cover and urged the 81-year-old to step aside.
title: First Democratic senator challenges Biden candidacy

description: The right to peaceful assembly in Europe is facing severe and systematic challenges as governments increasingly "stigmatize, criminalize, and crack down" on protesters, according to a new report by Amnesty International on Wednesday.
title: Amnesty: European governments suppress peaceful protests

description: The Israeli military urged all Palestinians to leave Gaza City and head south on Wednesday, pressing ahead with a fresh offensive across the north, south and center of the territory.
title: Israeli military orders evacuation of Gaza City

description: TEHRAN- For the second time in less than a month, the military media of Lebanon’s Hezbollah resistance movement has released aerial surveillance footage of sensitive Israeli military sites.
title: Hezbollah rattles Israelis with more drone footage

description: TEHRAN- The thought of potential arrest upon an order by the International Criminal Court (ICC) has made Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu break out in a cold sweat.
title: Bibi on pins and needles

description: TEHRAN – Pakistan’s Ambassador to Iran, Muhammad Mudassir Tipu, visited the Tehran Times headquarters on Wednesday to explore potential collaborations. He met with the publication’s CEO and Editor-in-Chief and participated in an interview with a Tehran Times correspondent.
title: Pakistan's ambassador in Iran visits Tehran Times for talks, interview

description: TEHRAN - Former Inter coach Andrea Stramaccioni feels Mehdi Taremi can make the difference under Simone Inzaghi this season.
title: Former Inter coach Stramaccioni praises Taremi

description: TEHRAN – A special museum dedicated to medical history will be set up within Shohada-ye Ashayer Hospital, which is located in Khorramabad, the capital of Lorestan province.
title: Medical history museum to be established in Lorestan

description: TEHRAN – The realm of ancient Persian mythology is full of vibrant tales of mythological creatures that reflect glimpses of civilization’s core values, fears, and hopes.
title: Discover the heart of ancient Persia through its mythological creatures

description: TEHRAN - Historically, Ilam has been renowned for its Kilim production, a craft that dates back centuries. However, the embossed kilims (locally named Gilim-e Naqsh Barjasteh) represent a relatively recent development in the region’s artisanal landscape.
title: From tradition to modernity: Ilam’s embossed kilims

description: TEHRAN – On Wednesday, Isfahan’s tourism chief Amir Karamzadeh emphasized the need for the province’s tourism sector to comply with global standards.
title: Isfahan tourism must align with global standards, provincial tourism chief says

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s deputy tourism minister Ali Darabi has said intangible cultural heritage is the ever-living soul of various cultures worldwide.
title: Intangible cultural heritage ever-living soul of nations, deputy minister says

description: TEHRAN- TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), fell 7,814 points to 2,209,202 on Wednesday, which is the fifth day of the Iranian calendar week.
title: TEDPIX falls 7,800 points on Wednesday

description: TEHRAN- National Iranian Gas Company (NIGC) has paid 80 trillion rials (about $138 million) to support and encourage investment making in development of renewable power plants in the country since the current government took office in August 2021, the company’s managing director announced.
title: NIGC pays $138m to encourage investment in development of renewable powerplants

description: TEHRAN – Iranian chess player Sina Movahed claimed the title of the Baku Open 2024.
title: Iran’s chess player Movahed wins Baku Open 2024

description: Interaction in a world that is increasingly striving for multipolarity was negotiated at one of the sessions of the Russian Creative Week in Moscow.
title: TV BRICS presents international media projects at the Russian Creative Week in Moscow

description: Have you ever been in a situation where you could barely find the supplements or cosmetic products you want? Or even circumstances in which you're required to look for a better price to pay?
title: By far the best online drugstore in Iran

description: Introduction: The global phenomenon of medical tourism, also known as health tourism, has gained significant attention in recent years. This article sheds light on the industry's benefits for a country's economy, delves into the potential of Iran as a tourist destination, and highlights the growth of medical tourism in Iran, along with its advantages. With its rich cultural heritage, advanced medical facilities, and competitive pricing, Iran has positioned itself as a compelling choice for medical tourists worldwide.
title: Exploring the Economic Benefits of the Medical Tourism in Iran

description: TEHRAN –The  United Nations Children’s Fund (UNICEF) and Panter Group have signed a three-year partnership agreement titled ‘Creativity for All Children’ to improve the lives of the most vulnerable children and adolescence in Iran.
title: ‘Creativity for all Children’ aims to improve lives of vulnerable children

description: TEHRAN –Observed on July 11, World Population Day focuses on population challenges. This year, it highlights the importance of population data gathering in understanding problems, developing solutions, and making progress.
title: World Population Day: data collection key for solving problems

description: TEHRAN –The National Artificial Intelligence Center was inaugurated on Wednesday in a ceremony attended by Acting President Mohammad Mokhber.
title: National center for artificial intelligence inaugurated

description: TEHRAN – The Department of Environment will play host to an event on July 12 to mark the International Day of Combating Sand and Dust Storms aiming to raise awareness and enhance resilience against SDSs as a global concern.
title: Iran to mark intl. day of combatting SDSs

description: TEHRAN - Pakistan's Ambassador to Iran, Muhammad Mudassir Tipu, visited the Tehran Times headquarters on Wednesday to discuss potential collaborations.
title: Pakistan ambassador emphasizes strong Iran-Pakistan ties during Tehran Times visit

description: TEHRAN – The head of Iran’s Ports and Maritime Organization (PMO) has said over the past few years the organization has managed to attract nearly $1.7 billion of foreign and domestic investment in the country’s ports and maritime sector.
title: PMO attracts nearly $1.7b of investment in ports, maritime sector

description: TEHRAN – Head of Iran’s National Petrochemical Company (NPC) Morteza Shahmirzaei has announced the opening of the country’s fifth research and technology center for petrochemical industries in Makran Coasts, southeastern Iran.
title: Iran launches petchem research, technology center in Makran coast

description: TEHRAN- Tehran Permanent International Fairgrounds is hosting the 13th International Exhibition of Elevators, Escalators, Elevating Conveyors and Accessories (IRAN LIFTEX 2024).
title: IRAN LIFTEX 2024 running in Tehran

description: TEHRAN - As the Paris 2024 Olympic Games approach, Iranian swimmer Samyar Abdoli is in the final stretch of his preparations, training diligently in Germany with only 15 days to go. Abdoli, who earned his place in the Olympics through a wildcard entry, is filled with a sense of joy and anticipation at prospect of competing in Paris.
title: Swimmer Abdoli happy to represent Iran at Olympics

description: TEHRAN- Malaysian Ambassador to Tehran Khairi Omar said that Malaysia’s Federal Agricultural Marketing Authority (FAMA) looks forward to cooperate very closely with its counterpart in Iran.
title: 'Malaysia’s Federal Agricultural Marketing Authority willing for co-op with Iran'

description: TEHRAN- Malaysian Ambassador to Tehran Khairi Omar said that Malaysia’s Federal Agricultural Marketing Authority (FAMA) looks forward to cooperate very closely with its counterpart in Iran.
title: Malaysia’s Federal Agricultural Marketing Authority willing for co-op with Iran’
